headline: One stop solution to spoil your career
pros: Nothing so far will let you know if I find any
cons:
The HR polices are just on paper.
You are expected to perform from day 1 without any training.
People are fired within 3 months of hiring. 
No job security at all. 
You are asked to put resignation every month and if you achieve your target for the month you will be revoked or else go home. 
You are expected to work 14 hrs a day. 
The managment and the seniors live in a fantasy world and think what they are providing is the best product and have no knowledge about competitors product. 
The product and the policies are not at all competitive and customer friendly. 
The company has a trail and error method for the sales people 
Hired in 1st month 
Will view your performance for the second month 
Will ask your resignation in the 3rd month if your second month's performance is not satisfactory. 
If you perform in the 3rd month you will he revoked if not then fired. 

Next month the same happens with the new candidate.
